meanings.def: a document that you send to somebody using email
the act of joining one thing to another; a thing that joins two things together
examples: All cars have points for the attachment of safety restraints.
attachment of something to something They discussed the attachment of new conditions to the peace plans.
attachment to something They had to check the strength of the seat attachments to the floor of the plane.

meanings.def: a feeling of love for somebody/something
examples: a child’s strong attachment to its parents
Prisoners can develop attachments to their guards.

meanings.def: belief in and support for an idea or a set of values
examples: the popular attachment to democratic government

meanings.def: a tool that you can fix onto a machine, to make it do another job
examples: an electric drill with a range of different attachments

meanings.def: a short time spent working with an organization such as a hospital, school or part of the armed forces
examples: on attachment (to something) She's on attachment to the local hospital.
